synos.tran: 检察官；[法]公诉人；起诉人；实行者

phrases.pCn: 首席检察官，主任检察官；检察长

remMethod.val: pro(前) + secu(追随) + tor(人) → 追随你到法院门前的人 → 起诉人

words.tran: 检举；贯彻；从事；依法进行

trans.tranCn: 检察官；公诉人；[法] 起诉人；实行者
trans.tranOther: In some countries, a prosecutor is a lawyer or official who brings charges against someone or tries to prove in a trial that they are guilty
